interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  121  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Reset "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first weekday on or after Day 121.

progression.synopsis: Makoto is on the school roof, looking at the view. After trying and failing to extort lunch from her, Sensei talks with her about how each of them came to be on the roof. When Makoto says that he could possibly have a hidden urge to jump off the building, and starts talking about suicide statistics, Sensei asks if she is okay â€” she says that she is, and didn't think there was anything odd about what she said. She does thank him for caring enough to ask, however.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
